response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $1,400,000. This is an exclusive chance to secure a remarkable asset at a competitive rate. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. Thank you for considering this unique proposition.", "product_price": 1400000}
